title: Recruiting ranked 5's team (Silver/Gold)
body:

Subs

~GroundRumpler

replies.body:
IGN: Elmerciece
Role: Anything but Jungle
Rank: Silver 5 (was 4 T__T)
Any team experience: Not much. I've had a few games with my friends and their teams but it wasn't exactly a thing of beauty
What time available: Because of school 6:00pm central. On week days On weekends however, 9:00am to whenever.
Anything you want to tell me: I joined a week before gnar came out, so im still fairly new to the game. I have basic understanding of the game, but I'm always eager to learn something unregistered or detailed when it comes to certain lanes. I main mostly top- My home. I mostly go mid- My fun lane Adc is the carry lane. Not too special to me. With support i feel like the Mama of the team. taking care of everyone. overall my best lane is top!

IGN: Fortify1
ROLE:ADC
RANK: Gold 5
Any team experience: Yes
What time available: M-F  8pm-1am Est 
Anything you want to tell me: I like to play{{champion:222}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:18}} {{champion:22}} {{champion:236}}

IGN: Shen Carry

Rank: Silver 2

Role: Support, Jungle Mains

Do you have Teamspeak3? Skype and a Teamspeak server that I and a friend run

What times can you play at? (time zone included please): 6pm to 1am weekdays, 3pm+ Weekends. Eastern Standard Time

Age: 21

Strengths: I have been playing since Syndra was released so a long time and know the mechanics of non carry roles very well. I also am competitive and humble when I play.

Weaknesses: I cannot play carry roles but can play top if need be. I prefer mostly high cc tank supports or junglers but play the occasional carry jungle if needed

What can you bring to the table team wise?: Im an experienced support who is willing to die to protect my carry or for the sake of peel and a gank focused jungler

Champ Pool: I own all champs but i main mostly tank supports and jungles but my favorite support currently is soraka and play her very well
other champs include but are not limited to{{champion:53}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:44}}

IGN: melidian
ROLE: ADC
RANK: Silver 1
Any team experience: Ranked 5's team I had with my friends, I played as the adc and we made it to Silver 2 going 9/10 in provisionals.
What time available: Monday-Friday After 5:30 pm, Saturday/Sunday pretty much anytime (Pacific time zone)
Anything you want to tell me: Well I guess my preferred adc's are Vayne, Draven, Lucian, and Jinx. I'm a 16 year old boy from Washington state currently attending high school as a sophomore. League is my favorite game and ranked 5's are my favorite from all the types. I enjoy being apart of a team and striving to improve myself and others.

> [{quoted}](name=melidian,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=iGqfPqzG,comment-id=0016,timestamp=2015-12-04T04:39:01.236+0000)

> Anything you want to tell me: Well I guess my preferred adc's are Vayne, Draven, Lucian, and Jinx. I'm a 16 year old boy from Washington state currently attending high school as a sophomore. League is my favorite game and ranked 5's are my favorite from all the types. I enjoy being apart of a team and striving to improve myself and others.

Awesome man! Well the tryouts for tonight are done unfortunately. We will have another set of tryouts as well tomorrow from 8-12pm. Show up and I'll make sure to get you in!

IGN: Fenrisulfr
ROLE: Top
Rank: Plat 4
Any team experience: I've played with many teams in my previous clan and have made many friends since then. I've shot called, I've coached, I've analysed, I've taught people how to play the game from level 1 to 30 and beyond. I've scrimmed, I've messed around - I've done it all really on a team basis.
What time available: Whenever. Literally. Except Tues/Weds 9 PM Eastern. Or when I'm sleeping.
Anything you want to tell me: I'll be upfront. I'm an ADC Main. But my  secondary role is best played top and I can do some crazy stuff both on my own and with my team. I would love the opportunity to grow and expand my horizons with a serious and dedicated team to better myself as a player, shotcaller, etc. If you wanna see some silly/serious stuff I'm capable of, check out my plays.tv: http://plays.tv/u/xSoulWolfx Little bit of stuff here and there but adding clips every so often.
Thanks!

IGN:HOPEE
ROLE:ADC/Jung/ALL
RANK:s1
Any team experience:igl in a few teams highest reached rank was gold 3 - inactive
What time available: flex
Anything you want to tell me: i am always improving and finding a way to win. i was gold 5 took a break came back recently
The teamspeak link: ts.emberzgaming.com

IGN: Fierce Damage
ROLE: Support or Mid
RANK: Currently Silver 2 (Was Gold 5 most of the season)
Any team experience: Yes, I have played on an all plat team before as support. As the team disbanded I played on several other teams which I played a role in shot calling or as a secondary information giver (flashes, jungler position, warding support, etc..)
What time available: I am available most days from 7 pm except (Tuesdays which I am only available from 10:20 PM and Fridays where I am available from 9:30 pm)
Anything you want to tell me: I want to focus as a support player since I feel its my best role

IGN: Jewmuffn
Role: ADC but ill play anything
Rank: Silver, up and down between 2 and 5
I have played a few ranked 5s and 3s mostly with friends
Available any day and time except Monday and Wednesday 4pm to 9 pm
I love to play ranked teams but no one ever seems to be as dedicated to playing them as i am. 
im best at jinx and twitch but will play almost any ADC. I can play all roles decently.

IGN: issarn
ROLE: Adc / mid
RANK:Silver 5 (Season 5)
Any team experience: No
What time available: Weekdays (11pm - 1am india time) weekends anytime
Anything you want to tell me: Im learning to shot call , i would like to do so for the team.

IGN:Rynsterr
ROLE:Top/mid mainly although i do everything
RANK:silver 5 peaked at silver 3 this season
Any team experience:been on a few teams, been apart of a few communities who had tournaments, had my own team for awhile
What time available:everyday after 9pm est NO SUNDAYS sundays i go to my fathers house but i will be able to do latenight sundays
Anything you want to tell me:I have been a shot caller and feel very comfortable talking to people on microphone, i have no filter and will usually say whatever comes to my mind and will constructively criticize people ( i dont go to an extent, i dont like to offend people )

Hey sorry for not having anything set on the first post on Boards/Reddit! The tryouts will be this Thursday and Friday from; 9:00-11:00(TR) and  8:00-11:00(F). The time zone is Eastern U.S. standard. 
Eastern: 9:00
Central: 8:00
West: 6:00
Teamspeak server will be announced 30 minutes prior to the tryouts, via Boards, Reddit, or messaging me in game! This is for the convenience of everyone else in the teampseak server  where we will be having tryouts. So please be courteous to everyone else in there! I look forward to seeing all of you there! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

IGN: TahmumuhaT.
ROLE: Support.
RANK: Silver 4.
Any team experience: No.
What time available: I mostly work evening shifts, which end between 8-11pm (EST). I'm also usually free prior to 12-2pm (EST) in the morning.

Anything you want to tell me: I've been trying for the longest time to start up a team of my own, but everyone I find seems to be flaky and/or not as serious about it as I am. Back when I switched from top to support, I spent months playing nothing but support (aside from the odd match elsewhere), learning one support after another.

And even when I play other roles, I tend to approach them almost as if I were the support, either by flexing out some of my go-to supports (ex. Tahm, Lulu, Naut), or going with champions who are there mainly to facilitate their team (ex. Amumu, Malph).

Lastly, when it comes to my champion pool, I'll play practically anything. I still haven't played every support extensively, but have tested out virtually every support, including niche stuff like Vel and Fiddle, and would be willing to practice any given support.

> [{quoted}](name=TahmumuhaT,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=iGqfPqzG,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2015-12-02T16:43:29.628+0000)

> 
> Anything you want to tell me: I've been trying for the longest time to start up a team of my own, but everyone I find seems to be flaky and/or not as serious about it as I am. Back when I switched from top to support, I spent months playing nothing but support (aside from the odd match elsewhere), learning one support after another.
> 
> And even when I play other roles, I tend to approach them almost as if I were the support, either by flexing out some of my go-to supports (ex. Tahm, Lulu, Naut), or going with champions who are there mainly to facilitate their team (ex. Amumu, Malph).
> 
> Lastly, when it comes to my champion pool, I'll play practically anything. I still haven't played every support extensively, but have tested out virtually every support, including niche stuff like Vel and Fiddle, and would be willing to practice any given support.

Awesome add me!

IGN: Syphax
Role: Jungle or fill, willing to adapt to any role
Rank: Silver V
I have very little experience playing ranked 5's as not very many of my friends play, but I would love to start getting some.
Availability: In the evenings on weekdays and pretty much all day on Saturday and Sunday with the exception of Friday and Saturday evenings.
I enjoy playing bruisers such as Wukong, Jarvan, etc. although I can play both carry junglers and supportive junglers to a standard level.
